ATLAS AIR WORLDWIDE   2020 ESG Report     26There is no greater asset than our people. We have built a culture that 
embraces both openness and collaboration by striving to ensure safety, 
professional development and equity for all employees. Elevating the 
employee experience increases opportunities for individual professional 
growth and will help fuel our company’s growth.IN THIS SECTION:

 ¬ Safety & Security

& Equity for
